content: knitting pattern english version design @fiolett patterns knitting pattern materials size 4 skeins of pearly haze colour artichoke onesize 110 colour teal 96 colour aster 69 colour peach 33 measurements double-pointed needles 4mm width 8 cm prior to garment blocking 10 cm after crochet hook for the flowers 3 5mm us4 garment blocking yarn needle length 46cm prior to garment blocking 50 cm markers if needed after garment blocking pattern information this is a headband inspired by the flowery and whimsical yarn quality world of the 1970s it is knitted with double-pointed pearly haze hobbii needles but can be knitted with circular or straight 73 % viscose 27 % wool 50 g = 110 m needles the flowers are crocheted and are a complement that you will knit apart from the headband they are an extra gauge but without the flowers the headband also looks very 22 sts x 24 row = 10 cm x 10 cm nice it is beginner friendly abbreviations knitting k = knit p = purl rh = right hand ltco = long tail cast-on bobble = bind off sl1 = slip_stitch one k2tog = knit 2 together psso = pass slipped stitch over crochet chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch decrease = single_crochet 2 together knitting pattern ppaatttteerrnn info and tips it is a rectangular design that oonnccee knitted you will sseeww ttoo ffoorrmm tthhee cciirrccllee tthhiiss ssiizzee knitting pattern row 1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p2 *insert rh needle into 3rd st down from 2nd st on left needle draw through a loop leave loop on rh needle k3 make 2nd loop into the same st* p2 repeat from * to * p2 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 row 2 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k2 *sl the loop p3 slip the loop*
